article_title: Survey: 69% of big companies expect ACA to raise costs in 2015
article_text: Heather Stauffer covers the health care industry. She can be reached at hstauffer@lnpnews.com or 717-481-6022.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , affordable care act, health insurance, wellness
article_metadata.author: HEATHER STAUFFER | Staff Writer

og.description: Sixty-nine percent of big companies expect the ACA to increase their costs in 2015, up from 53 percent in 2014
